SELECT oi.id, oi.order_id, oi.commodity_id, oi.commodity_name, oi.quantity, oi.info_id, oi.status, oi.shop_id, oi.track_number, ci.specification, ci.weight, ci.price, o.create_time, o.user_id, a.address, a.name, a.phone FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN orders o on oi.order_id = o.order_id LEFT JOIN address a on o.address_id = a.id LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci on oi.info_id = ci.id WHERE oi.id = #{id}
